job_details.company_rating: string - Company rating if available (e.g., '3.9 out of 5 stars') or null
job_details.location_detail: string - Full address or location details if available, or null
job_details.pay_min_annual: number - Minimum annual pay as integer, or null
job_details.pay_max_annual: number - Maximum annual pay as integer, or null
job_details.pay_display: string - Original pay text as displayed (e.g., '$86,800 - $198,000 a year')
job_details.job_post_url: string - Direct URL to job posting
job_details.apply_url: string - URL to apply page or company career site
job_details.security_clearance_required: string - Required clearance level or null
job_details.security_clearance_preferred: string - Preferred clearance level or null
job_details.work_model_notes: string - Additional work model details or null
job_details.posting_age: string - How long ago posted (e.g., '2 days ago') or null

job_board_list_context.employer_group_page: string - Employer-specific page title or null

listed_benefits: array of strings - Bullet list of benefits (e.g., 'Tuition reimbursement', 'Health insurance')
benefits.benefits_text: string - Full benefits description text or null
benefits.eligibility_notes: string - Benefits eligibility details or null
benefits.relocation: string - Relocation assistance details or null
benefits.sign_on_bonus: string - Sign-on bonus details or null

job_description.headline: string - Job title or headline
job_description.short_summary: string - Brief 1-2 sentence summary of role
job_description.full_text: string - Complete job description as plain text with newlines preserved
job_description.required_experience_years_min: number - Minimum years required or null
job_description.required_education: string - Required education level/degree or null
